pages.title: Japanese Giant Salamander
pages.text: The Japanese giant salamander ($(o)Andrias japonicus$()) is a species of salamander in the family Cryptobranchidae.$(br2)This fully aquatic salamander is endemic to Japan, where it is known as Ōsanshōuo ($(o)オオサンショウウオ/大山椒魚$()), literally meaning "giant salamander".

pages.title: Japanese Giant Salamander
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)3 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:food_turtle_raw$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
